com.nutiteq.cache
Class PersistentCache

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.cache.PersistentCache

public class PersistentCache
extends java.lang.Object

Persistent file based cache for map tiles. Cache is organized as fully associative LRU cache.

Constructor Summary
PersistentCache()
           
 
Method Summary
 void add(long tileId, byte[] compressed)
          Add existing compressed raster map tile to the cache.
 void clear()
          Clear the cache.
 void closeDb()
          Close persistent cache database.
 boolean contains(long tileId)
          Test if compressed bitmap exists in the cache.
 byte[] get(long tileId)
          Get existing compressed bitmap from the cache.
 void remove(long tileId)
          Remove existing tile from the cache.
 void removeRange(long firstTileId, long lastTileId)
          Remove consecutive tile range from the cache.
 void reopenDb()
          Re-open persistent cache database.
 void setPath(java.lang.String path)
          Set path of the cache file to use.
 void setSize(int maxSizeInBytes)
          Set new cache size limit.
 

Constructor Detail

PersistentCache

public PersistentCache()
Method Detail

setPath

public void setPath(java.lang.String path)
Set path of the cache file to use.

Parameters:
path - path of the cache file.

setSize

public void setSize(int maxSizeInBytes)
Set new cache size limit. If new size is smaller than existing size, some elements can be evicted.

Parameters:
maxSizeInBytes - new size limit for the cache.

clear

public void clear()
Clear the cache.

add

public void add(long tileId,
                byte[] compressed)
Add existing compressed raster map tile to the cache. Existing tiles can be evicted if cache size limit is exceeded.

Parameters:
tileId - id of the tile to add.
compressed - compressed bitmap for the tile.

contains

public boolean contains(long tileId)
Test if compressed bitmap exists in the cache. This test can be much faster than actually reading the data.

Parameters:
tileId - id of the tile to test.
Returns:
true if tile exists, false otherwise.

get

public byte[] get(long tileId)
Get existing compressed bitmap from the cache. The bitmap will be the last in the eviction queue after this call.

Parameters:
tileId - id of the tile to get.
Returns:
compressed bitmap or null if the cache does not contain it.

remove

public void remove(long tileId)
Remove existing tile from the cache.

Parameters:
tileId - id of the tile to remove.

removeRange

public void removeRange(long firstTileId,
                        long lastTileId)
Remove consecutive tile range from the cache.

Parameters:
firstTileId - id of the first tile to remove (inclusive).
lastTileId - id of the last tile to remove (exclusive).

reopenDb

public void reopenDb()
Re-open persistent cache database.

closeDb

public void closeDb()
Close persistent cache database. Persistent cache will be unavailable after this call until setPath is called.
